channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: La crise est telle que Samsung refuse de se vendre de la RAM à lui-même
item.description: Si vous avez observé le secteur des composants PC ces derniers temps, il est impossible que vous soyez passé à côté de la crise qui touche le marché de la RAM dont tous les composants sont siphonnés par l’industrie de l’IA. Samsung le sait mieux que personne.

item.title: Legal AI startup Harvey confirms $8B valuation
item.description: Harvey confirms a third enormous round of funding in 2025 that has skyrocketed its valuation. Again.

item.title: Nic Cage Is Playing Ben Reilly in ‘Spider-Noir’
item.description: Spider-Man Noir is swinging to Prime Video next year... but not with the name you're expecting.

item.title: Ray-Ban’s Meta smart glasses are even cheaper than they were on Black Friday
item.description: It sounds weird to say it’s a good thing if you missed the Ray-Ban Meta deal on Black Friday, but… it’s kind of true. The original Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses just fell to an even better all-time low of $224.25 ($75) at Amazon and Best Buy, which beats the Black Friday price by $15. That’s a great deal because, even […]

item.title: Sanctioned spyware maker Intellexa had direct access to government espionage victims, researchers say
item.description: Based on a leaked video, security researchers alleged that Intellexa staffers have remote live access to their customers' surveillance systems, allowing them to see hacking targets’ personal data.

item.title: Hyundai’s charming autonomous robot can be everything from a golf trolley to an e-scooter – and it's going on sale soon
item.description: Hyundai announces its first production-ready autonomous robot that wants be your friend and your co-worker.

item.title: Hemp-THC drinks were the hottest thing in zero-proof culture. Congress just put them on notice
item.description: The new rule slashes allowable THC levels to a fraction of what’s in popular hemp spritzes, putting a fast-growing alcohol alternative at risk. The bill that brought the government back online last month ended the shutdown with an unexpected catch that could crush an entire industry.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang lobbies Trump and Republicans over AI chip restrictions
item.description: Huang is among the Silicon Valley executives who warn that any restrictions on AI will halt its advancement despite mounting concerns. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang met separately with President Donald Trump and Republican senators Wednesday as tech executives work to secure favorable federal policies for the artificial intelligence industry, including the limited sale of Nvidia’s highly valued computer chips to U.S. rivals like China....

item.title: Rare disease: Our $1 trillion healthcare reform opportunity
item.description: Expanded newborn genetic screening can diagnose hundreds of actionable conditions, allowing for earlier treatment. Every year in the United States, thousands of families face a devastating reality: Their child has a rare disease, but they won’t know it until it’s too late for effective intervention. Thirty percent of children with rare diseases don’t live to see their fifth birthday. ...

item.title: The pros and cons of being un-self-aware
item.description: Is it really always best to know thyself? The world of popular psychological ideas, which is largely the self-help industry, is not short of contradictions. For instance, it simultaneously promotes the benefits of emotional intelligence (the ability to empathize with others and engage in strategic impression management) and authenticity (the tendency to express what you really feel and think without much consideration for others’ opinions). It also frequently celebrates self-acceptance and constant self-improvement (“love yourself as you are”… but also “become the best version of yourself”), m...

item.title: La Russie bloque les appels FaceTime
item.description: Il n'est plus possible de passer des appels FaceTime en Russie. Les autorités reprochent au service d'Apple de faciliter des opérations terroristes. Le pays mène une véritable guérilla contre les plateformes étrangères.

item.title: Amazon’s new Kindle Scribe and Kindle Scribe Colorsoft launch on December 10
item.description: The new Kindle Scribe has a larger 11-inch glare-free display, is just 5.4 mm thick, and weighs only 400 g. It’s also 40% faster when writing or turning pages.

item.title: New Baldness Drug Boosted Hair Growth by 539% in Trials
item.description: The topical medication, called Clascoterone, could represent the first truly novel drug for male pattern baldness seen in about 30 years.

item.title: Roblox, FaceTime become the last targets of Russia's censorship
item.description: Russia has blocked FaceTime and Roblox, tightening its censorship push as users lose access to most major Western platforms.

item.title: Arm64 dominates AWS Lambda in 2025: Rust 4-5x faster than x86, costs 30% less across all workloads
item.description: AWS Lambda benchmarks in 2025 show arm64 consistently outperforms x86 across Rust, Python, and Node.js, and significantly reduces costs.

item.title: Hulu renews Chad Powers for season 2, and Glen Powell says it actually has a satisfying arc planned
item.description: Chad Powers will return back to the playing field and star Glenn Powell teased they've had big plans for its future.

item.title: Forget Spotify Wrapped, get back into CDs with FiiO’s gorgeous new portable player
item.description: CDs are so back, baby! FiiO’s new portable player is also a hi-res DAC, Bluetooth transmitter and wireless bridge for your music

item.title: How an unemployed teacher is changing public education
item.description: Kids and communities are responding to seeds of hope planted in the concrete jungle. The Bronx stands apart from New York City’s four other boroughs in stark ways. Home to 1.4 million residents and the nation’s poorest congressional district, it once flourished as fertile farmland. Today, we’re restoring this land—not to its agricultural roots, but as fertile ground for raising healthy, happy, and prosperous children....

item.title: AI’s future runs on water
item.description: The tech sector must lead now. The rise of artificial intelligence is transforming every industry, but it also creates enormous demand for digital infrastructure and natural resources. Data centers, the engines of this transformation, consume vast amounts of water and energy.

item.title: Customer data stolen in Freedom Mobile account management platform hack
item.description: A third-party attack hits the Canadian telco, users lose names, phone numbers, and user accounts.

item.title: Marvel Rivals now has a gacha mini-game featuring a limited-time Psylocke bundle – here's how it works
item.description: The first anniversary of Marvel Rivals is right around the corner, and to continue the celebrations, a new gacha system has been added to the game that will reward players with a limited-time hero bundle.

item.title: Black Friday may be over but our exclusive Norton VPN deal is still going strong
item.description: This great price on a new VPN courtesy of cybersecurity giant Norton will help lift your post-Black Friday blues.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écrans PC Ultrawide 21/9 et 32/9 en 2025 ? Le comparatif
item.description: Si vous êtes à la recherche d’un écran gaming très large ou d'une vaste interface pour le travail, vous êtes au bon endroit. Découvrez notre sélection des meilleurs écrans ultrawide.

item.title: À peine 20 € pour cette batterie externe MagSafe certifiée Qi2 10 000 mAh, c’est le super deal du jour
item.description: Cette batterie externe Baseus AirPow II est conçue pour une charge rapide filaire ou sans-fil que vous retrouvez pour 22,39 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 31,99 euros.

item.title: The CZUR ET24 Pro isn’t a perfect book scanner, but those who need one don’t have many choices
item.description: The CZUR ET24 Pro is a scanner designed to efficiently capture books up to A3 in size.

item.title: Behold: A Transformer That Turns Into a Working Bluetooth Speaker and Tape Deck
item.description: It is my pleasure to welcome Robosen's Soundwave.

item.title: Sam Altman Wants His Own Rocket Company
item.description: The OpenAI CEO explored a deal with Stoke Space that would have put him in control of the rocket startup.

item.title: Amazon is reportedly ready to drop its USPS deal if negotiations fall through
item.description: After over 30 years, Amazon may be cutting ties with the United States Postal Service as it looks to expand its own delivery network, as reported by The Washington Post. The outlet, owned by Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, cites anonymous sources who said negotiations between Amazon and Trump-appointed USPS Postmaster General David Steiner have reportedly […]...

item.title: Smartphones, PC : la flambée des prix va durer « 18 à 36 mois », le pire est à venir
item.description: Mauvaise nouvelle si vous comptiez renouveler votre équipement. La hausse des prix de la mémoire et du stockage ne fait que commencer et le pic inflationniste n'est attendu que pour l'été 2026. Une crise qui pourrait s'installer durablement, selon les prévisions des experts du secteur.

item.title: A Bronze Statue of RoboCop Finally Stands Tall in Detroit
item.description: It took the better part of two decades, but a monument to the 1987 Paul Verhoeven classic is now on display.

item.title: California’s ban on self-driving trucks could soon be over
item.description: Revised rules in California would allow self-driving trucks to test on public highways. The rules also close a loophole allowing police to issue tickets for driverless vehicles.

item.title: Ralph Lauren reveals Team USA’s uniforms for 2026 Winter Olympics
item.description: A Team USA collection, which will be given to athletes as Olympic village wear, is also now available to the public. Ralph Lauren revealed Team USA’s Milan Cortina Winter Olympics looks Thursday, complete with Americana knit sweaters and plenty of vintage call-backs.The formal opening ceremony look pairs a patterned red, white and blue knit sweater with tailored cream trousers and a matching wool coat. Moving sportier, the closing ceremony outfit features a graphic puffer coat inspired by vintage ski kits over a color-blocked sweater.“We are creating something that we know has to become timele...

item.title: Hallmark choosing to cancel The Way Home after season 4 is the right call – asking Netflix for season 5 is a waste of time
item.description: The Way Home season 4 drops in 2026, and it will be the final ever season. Instead of asking Netflix to make more, we should enjoy what we have.

item.title: Threads will let users speak to the algorithm
item.description: Threads is testing a public “Dear Algo” feature that lets users temporarily steer what their feed shows by posting requests directly to the algorithm.

item.title: « J’ai trouvé ça complètement fou » : on a lâché un débutant dans une Tesla, heureusement que le FSD était actif
item.description: On a envoyé un Vendéen sur les autoroutes de Los Angeles, en plein chaos urbain. Un novice dans un Tesla Cybertruck ? Oui, c'est possible, et tout s'est bien passé, grâce à la fonction la plus révolutionnaire des Tesla : le FSD. Récit d'un moment hors du commun.

item.title: A New Anonymous Phone Carrier Lets You Sign Up With Nothing but a Zip Code
item.description: Privacy stalwart Nicholas Merrill spent a decade fighting an FBI surveillance order. Now he wants to sell you phone service—without knowing almost anything about you.

item.title: Amazon’s new color Kindle Scribe launches on December 10th
item.description: Amazon has finally given a release date for its new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft and Kindle Scribe: They’ll be available to purchase starting on December 10th, Amazon spokesperson Rachel Erickson tells The Verge. They’ll cost the same as what Amazon announced back in September: $629.99 for the Colorsoft and $499.99 for the Scribe, which includes a […]

item.title: Why Day One Ventures’ Masha Bucher thinks VCs and storytelling go hand-in-hand
item.description: Day One Ventures' Masha Bucher doesn't just invest in startups — she also tells their stories. Her integrated model aligns incentives and proves conviction matters more than contracts.

item.title: Meta centralizes Facebook and Instagram support, tests AI support assistant
item.description: The new support hub will connect users to security tools, account recovery options, and an AI assistant.

item.title: OpenAI must adapt to a world where it’s no longer invincible
item.description: Without the best models and chatbot, does the startup’s core proposition still work? Welcome to AI Decoded, Fast Company’s weekly newsletter that breaks down the most important news in the world of AI. I’m Mark Sullivan, a senior writer at Fast Company, covering emerging tech, AI, and tech policy.

item.title: ByteDance and DeepSeek Are Placing Very Different AI Bets
item.description: The diverging path of China’s two leading AI players shows where the country’s artificial intelligence industry is headed.

item.title: This Might Be the Biggest Thing in the Universe That Spins
item.description: Space is packed with all sorts of weird and unexpected stuff, but this humongous, spinning string-thing raises a whole new set of questions.

item.title: En 2026, Meta continuerait de tailler dans son budget métavers
item.description: Meta s’apprêterait à tailler à nouveau dans le rêve du métavers. Le groupe prévoirait jusqu’à 30 % de coupes budgétaires supplémentaires en 2026, avec de nouveaux licenciements potentiels dès janvier.

item.title: This stunning landscape photo was shot with a five-year-old Canon camera, and it just won top prize at major photo contest
item.description: The International Landscape Photographer of The Year 2025 contest winners have been announced, and the winning image was taken with a popular pro Canon camera

item.title: L’iPhone Air s’effondre sur le marché de l’occasion
item.description: C'est pas la joie pour l'iPhone Air, suite. Le smartphone ultra-fin ne rencontrerait pas les ferveurs des consommateurs, et ce manque d'appétit pour le smartphone se lit aussi sur le marché de l'occasion. La cote de l'appareil a en effet rapidement chuté.

item.title: Gizmodo Consumer Tech Editor Raymond Wong’s 8 Most Underrated Tech Gifts
item.description: Nothing too crazy, just some humble and reasonable items that I've gotten a lot of value from.

item.title: Amazon UK launches a big end-of-year sale – I've picked the top 13 tech deals and cheap last-minute gift ideas
item.description: Amazon UK has launched a big end-of-year sale, featuring some Black Friday-level price cuts on lots of top tech, home essentials, and last-minute gift ideas.

item.title: National Cookie Day 2025: Free cookies from Pepperidge Farms, Crumbl, Panera Bread, and more sweet deals available today
item.description: National Cookie Day is Dec. 4 and you can score free cookies from Crumbl, Pepperidge Farms, Nestle, and more.

item.title: Kim Kardashian mastered getting your attention. Now she’s teaching a class on building a billion-dollar empire off it
item.description: The reality TV icon’s new MasterClass, launching today, promises students the skills to ‘create marketing that commands attention.’ From reality TV to fashion and beauty and everywhere in between, you’ve unmistakably heard of Kim Kardashian. Critics may talk, but there’s no denying she’s one of the most influential and accomplished women of our time—with a net worth of $1.7 billion. And she’s still expanding....

item.title: The PC component crisis just got worse, as major RAM maker gives up on consumers and CPU price hikes are rumored
item.description: Want more pessimistic predictions of future component pricing? We're not short of those right now, sadly.
